original_text: When John's messengers had gone, Jesus began to speak to the crowds concerning John: “What did you go out into the wilderness to see? A reed shaken by the wind?
korean_text: 요한이 보낸 자가 떠난 후에 예수께서 무리에게 요한에 대하여 말씀하시되 너희가 무엇을 보려고 광야에 나갔더냐 바람에 흔들리는 갈대냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus began to speak to the crowds concerning John:
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 무리에게 요한에 관하여 말씀하기 시작하시니

sentences.original_text: “What did you go out into the wilderness to see?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 광야에 나가 보려고 무엇을 보았느냐?

sentences.original_text: A reed shaken by the wind?
